title.rendered: Ambassador Yusuf M. Tuggar (OON) received in audience Ms. Aisha Rimi

content.rendered:
The Honourable Minister of Foreign Affairs, Ambassador Yusuf M. Tuggar (OON) received in audience Ms. Aisha Rimi, the Executive Secretary of Nigeria Investment Promotion Commission (NIPC) Today, 6th February, 2024.

Discussions centered on strengthening collaboration between the Ministry and NIPC in the area of trade and investment.

Present at the meeting was the Director Economic, Trade and Investment Dept. MFA, Ambassador Bolaji Akinremi among other officials.
